alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 9:20PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Erath, Eastland and Comanche Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 920 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Olden, or near Eastland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Comanche, Eastland, Cisco, Dublin, Ranger, De Leon, Gorman, Rising Star, Lake Cisco, Lake Leon, Huckabay, Lake Olden, Proctor Lake, Pleasant Hill, Carbon, Staff, Purves, Nimrod and Comyn. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 326 and 368. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Texas.
